## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`cargo test --all`)
- [ ] Added new tests for this feature/fix
- [ ] Tested manually with examples (e.g., `cargo run --example rpg_demo`)
- [ ] No clippy warnings (`cargo clippy --all -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Code is properly formatted (`cargo fmt --all`)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows Rust API guidelines and project style
- [ ] Self-reviewed the code
- [ ] Added/updated rustdoc comments for public APIs
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] Added examples in doc comments where helpful
- [ ] Considered backward compatibility
- [ ] Performance impact assessed (if applicable)
